title: JLL® JF100 Home Exercise Bike, 2025 New Adjustable Magnetic Resistance Cardio Workout, 4kg Bi-Directional Flywheel, Display with Heart-Rate Sensor, Adjustable Handlebars & Seat Height
features: 【Quiet Magnetic Resistance】JLL exercise bike features magnetic resistance, a contactless system that eliminates friction loss and noise commonly associated with traditional friction resistance. Unlike friction resistance, the magnetic system does not require direct contact with the flywheel. This not only ensures a silent fitness environment but also minimizes wear and tear on components, eliminating the need for accessory replacements.

【LCD Monitor】Stay informed about your fitness progress with the LCD monitor that tracks key metrics in real time. Monitor your speed, calories, time, distance, odometer and heart rate. This spin bike provides valuable insights into your workout, allowing you to tailor your exercise routine for optimal results.

【Comfort exercise with Adjustable Features】Find the perfect riding posture with adjustable Handlebars can rotate 360 degree and up to 7-Levels of adjustable seat height. This high level of adjustability ensures that users of all sizes can customize the stationary bike to their preferences, making the exercise experience more comfortable. Note: The home bike has been designed for domestic use and is intended to be used while seated, not stood up.

【Compact Design & Easy to Move】 Experience enhanced stability and durability with our indoor bike's reinforced frame made from high-quality materials. Its compact, space-efficient design is perfect for small living rooms, ensuring an ideal fit without compromising performance. Additionally, the convenience of transport wheels allows easy mobility, enabling you to effortlessly move the mini exercise bike from room to room within your home gym for a flexible and efficient fitness experience.

【12-Month Warranty】Purchase with confidence, as the JLL exercise bike for home use comes with a 12-month warranty. This warranty period reflects the brand's commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, offering peace of mind for users. Experience the benefits of a reliable and durable static bike with the assurance of a comprehensive warranty.
description: Product Description JF100 Silent Magnetic Exercise Bike for Home Silent magnetic resistance with no friction or noise. LCD screen shows speed, time, distance, calories and heart rate. Adjustable seat and 360 degree handlebars provide a comfortable fit. Compact design with transport wheels for easy movement. Ideal for indoor cycling and home cardio.
